channel.title: Festivals in India on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Festivals in India on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Happy Durga Puja
item.description: Hello everyone, happy festivity it is time of celebration in India specially north and east where it is NavaRatri in North and Durga Puja in East. Pamela and Arush left on Sunday for Durg. It will be almost after 8 years Pamela will be at her mother house to celebrate Durga Puja. For Bengali’s it is the most special occasion in the whole calender. According to mythological believe Goddess Durga is a daughter of every Bengali and she visit her parents with her four children.
